activities: Personal information will be gathered as part of the users registration to attend events.  By definition, this is opt-in since the information is willingly provided and and event registration could not occur without it.  The only 3rd party who will ever be allowed any of this information are the event organizers and services such as hotels and badge printers.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
recoursemech: We intend full cooperation with data protection authorities located in the European Union or their authorized representatives.
